snippet: If a pause is agreed to, it will be a victory in efforts to push Saudi Arabia to let up the airstrikes long enough for food and fuel to be delivered.
abstract: Saudi Arabia will reportedly stop airstrikes in Yemen long enough for humanitarian aid to be delivered.

byline.contributor: Shuaib Almosawa contributed reporting from Sana, Yemen.

lead_paragraph: If a pause is agreed to, it will be a victory in efforts to push Saudi Arabia to let up the airstrikes long enough for food and fuel to be delivered.

headline.main: Yemen Expects a Pause in Fighting for Aid Deliveries
headline.print_headline: Saudis Are Expected to Pause Their Yemen Campaign
